definition: the back of a body or object/to turn one's back/to hide something from/to learn by heart/to recite from memory/unlucky (slang)/hard of hearing
to be burdened/to carry on the back or shoulder

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: He described opposition forces as "traitors" and "sons of dogs".
sentences.chinese: 他称反对派力量是“背叛者”和“走狗”。

sentences.english: And when the time is right, the betrayer will become, the betrayed.
sentences.chinese: 但是，背叛者伊利丹的到来撼动了他对外域的统治。
我的血亲和我的背叛者。

sentences.english: However, the arrival of Illidan the Betrayer shake his rule of the external domain.
sentences.chinese: 但是，背叛者伊利丹的到来撼动了他对外域的统治。

sentences.english: The king banished the traitor from the realm.
sentences.chinese: 国王把背叛者驱逐出王国。

definition: breaking faith and abandoning right (idiom); to betray/treachery/perfidy
